h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Loongwreathe Staff Location
content: The Loongwreathe Staff can be found in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Red Loong or in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Black Loong, or in Chapter 3 - The New West upon defeating Cyan Loong. Whenever you defeat any of these bosses, the weapon will be craftable from the Shrine menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loongwreathe_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Loongwreathe Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Loongwreathe Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Loongwreathe Staff can be found in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Red Loong or in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Black Loong, or in Chapter 3 - The New West upon defeating Cyan Loong. Whenever you defeat any of these bosses, the weapon will be craftable from the Shrine menu.
